data.subject_line: 10 GHC earned - your digital toolkit is ready
data.message_body: Excellent {name}! You've downloaded all your priority apps and earned 10 GHC. Your digital toolkit is now complete: {downloaded_apps}. Next step: Register in these apps to start achieving your goals. The first app you register in will earn you 15 GHC + 250MB data!

data.subject_line: 5 GHC earned for setting your goals
data.message_body: Great work {name}! You've earned 5 GHC for setting your goals. We now know what matters to you: {tier1_goals}. Based on your priorities we've selected the perfect apps for you. Download them now and earn another 10 GHC! Your personalized digital toolkit is ready.

data.subject_line: Let's simplify and refocus on what matters most
data.message_body: {name} let's take a step back. Sometimes starting with fewer goals works better. Pick your #1 most important goal and let's focus on mastering just one app first. Once you're confident with one you can always add more. Success with one app beats struggling with many. What matters most to you right now?

data.subject_line: What matters most to you?
data.message_body: {name} your verification is complete! Now let's find apps that match YOUR priorities. Do you want to: Save money for the future? Access healthcare easily? Learn new skills? Grow your business? Tell us your top priorities and we'll recommend the perfect apps. Plus you'll earn 5 GHC for setting your goals!

data.subject_line: Download your priority apps and earn 10 GHC
data.message_body: {name} your goals are set but your apps are waiting! We've selected these apps specifically for your priorities: {tier1_app_list}. Download all your priority apps now and earn 10 GHC. These apps will help you: {goal_benefits}. Don't wait - your digital tools are ready!

data.subject_line: Congratulations! You've achieved digital independence
data.message_body: {name} after {days_active} days you've mastered digital services! Your achievements: {tier1_apps_mastered} apps actively used {total_activities} successful transactions {total_rewards_earned} GHC + {total_data_earned}MB earned Digital habits formed You're now a digital champion in your community. Consider helping others start their journey too!

data.subject_line: 10 GHC earned for secure verification
data.message_body: Congratulations {name}! You've completed secure verification and earned 10 GHC. This money will be sent to your account shortly. Your identity is now protected and you can access all Uniti features. Next step: Tell us about your goals so we can recommend the best apps for you.

data.subject_line: Complete verification to unlock all features
data.message_body: Hi {name} you're missing out on the full Uniti experience! Complete your verification with your Ghana Card and a selfie to: ✓ Earn 10 GHC immediately ✓ Access all apps safely ✓ Protect your money and data. It takes 2 minutes.

data.subject_line: Having trouble with your apps? Here's personalized help
data.message_body: Hi {name} we noticed you haven't been using your apps much. That's okay - digital services can take time to learn! Common issues we can help with: App not working properly? Forgot passwords? Need help with features? Reply to this message or contact our support team. We're here to help you succeed!

data.subject_line: Your monthly 500MB data credit is here
data.message_body: Hi {name}! Your monthly 500MB data credit has been added to your account. This is your base data allocation for exploring apps and staying connected. Use it to: Try new app features Watch tutorial videos Stay in touch with support Active users earn bonus data on top of this!

data.subject_line: Your setup is complete - here's how to earn more
data.message_body: {name} you're officially ready to go digital! You've earned 30 GHC just for getting started. Now the real rewards begin: 15 GHC for first app registration 20 GHC for first core activity Weekly data rewards for active usage Your journey to digital independence has begun!

data.subject_line: 5 GHC + 350MB earned for P2G completion
data.message_body: Thank you {name}! You've completed your first Progress-to-Goal survey and earned 5 GHC + 350MB data. Your feedback helps us serve you better. Based on your responses here are personalized recommendations: {p2g_recommendations}. Next P2G survey in 4 weeks - another opportunity to earn!

data.subject_line: 350MB earned for P2G survey
data.message_body: Thanks {name}! You've completed P2G survey #{p2g_count} and earned 350MB data. Your continued feedback is valuable. Keep using your apps actively and watch for your next P2G survey in 4 weeks. Every survey completed earns data rewards!

data.subject_line: Welcome to your digital future
data.message_body: Hello {name}! Your phone is now verified with Uniti. You're about to discover apps that can help you save money access healthcare improve your education and grow your business - all from your phone. Your journey to digital independence starts now.

data.subject_line: How Progress-to-Goal surveys work
data.message_body: Hi {name}! You've been using Uniti for 3 weeks. It's time for your first Progress-to-Goal (P2G) survey. This quick survey: ✓ Takes 2 minutes ✓ Helps us improve your experience ✓ Earns you 5 GHC + 250MB data Complete your P2G survey honestly - whether positive or negative feedback you still earn the reward!

data.subject_line: Refer friends and earn 1GB data for each
data.message_body: {name} you're doing so well with Uniti! Help your friends and family get started too. For each person you refer who completes setup you'll earn 1GB data. They'll also get fast-track onboarding support. Sharing digital opportunities strengthens your whole community!

data.subject_line: 500MB earned for sharing your story
